verses.verse: וַתְּהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become הַמִּלְחָמָה֙ <S%H4421><s%> war אֲרֻכָּ֔ה <S%H752><s%> Now there was long בֵּ֚ין <S%H996><s%> between בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> between the house שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul וּבֵ֖ין <S%H996><s%> between בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> and the house דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> of David וְדָוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> but David הֹלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> waxed וְחָזֵ֔ק <S%H2390><s%> stronger וּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> and the house שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul הֹלְכִ֥ים <S%H1980><s%> waxed וְדַלִּֽים׃ <S%H1800><s%> weaker ס

[וַיֵּלְדוּ כ] (וַיִּוָּלְד֧וּ <S%H3205><s%> bear ק) לְדָוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> And unto David בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> were sons בְּחֶבְר֑וֹן <S%H2275><s%> in Hebron וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become בְכוֹרוֹ֙ <S%H1060><s%> and his firstborn אַמְנ֔וֹן <S%H550><s%> was Amnon לַאֲחִינֹ֖עַם <S%H293><s%> of Ahinoam הַיִּזְרְעֵאלִֽת׃ <S%H3159><s%> the Jezreelitess

וּמִשְׁנֵ֣הוּ <S%H4932><s%> And his second כִלְאָ֔ב <S%H3609><s%> Chileab [לַאֲבִיגֵל כ] (לַאֲֽבִיגַ֕יִל <S%H26><s%> Abigal ק) אֵ֖שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> the wife נָבָ֣ל <S%H5037><s%> of Nabal הַֽכַּרְמְלִ֑י <S%H3761><s%> the Carmelite וְהַשְּׁלִשִׁי֙ <S%H7992><s%> and the third אַבְשָׁל֣וֹם <S%H53><s%> Absalom בֶּֽן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מַעֲכָ֔ה <S%H4601><s%> of Maacah בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter תַּלְמַ֖י <S%H8526><s%> of Talmai מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king גְּשֽׁוּר׃ <S%H1650><s%> of Geshur

וְהָרְבִיעִ֖י <S%H7243><s%> And the fourth אֲדֹנִיָּ֣ה <S%H138><s%> Adonijah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חַגִּ֑ית <S%H2294><s%> of Haggith וְהַחֲמִישִׁ֖י <S%H2549><s%> and the fifth שְׁפַטְיָ֥ה <S%H8203><s%> Shephatiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲבִיטָֽל׃ <S%H37><s%> of Abital

וְהַשִּׁשִּׁ֣י <S%H8345><s%> And the sixth יִתְרְעָ֔ם <S%H3507><s%> Ithream לְעֶגְלָ֖ה <S%H5698><s%> by Eglah אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> David's אֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These יֻלְּד֥וּ <S%H3205><s%> These were born לְדָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> to David בְּחֶבְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H2275><s%> in Hebron פ

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came בִּֽהְיוֹת֙ <S%H1961><s%> came הַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> And it came to pass while there was war בֵּ֚ין <S%H996><s%> between בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> between the house שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul וּבֵ֖ין <S%H996><s%> between בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> and the house דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> of David וְאַבְנֵ֛ר <S%H74><s%> that Abner הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> came מִתְחַזֵּ֖ק <S%H2388><s%> made himself strong בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> for the house שָׁאֽוּל׃ <S%H7586><s%> of Saul

וּלְשָׁא֣וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul פִּלֶ֔גֶשׁ <S%H6370><s%> had a concubine וּשְׁמָ֖הּ <S%H8034><s%> whose name רִצְפָּ֣ה <S%H7532><s%> [was] Rizpah בַת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter אַיָּ֑ה <S%H345><s%> of Aiah וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> and [Ishbosheth] said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַבְנֵ֔ר <S%H74><s%> to Abner מַדּ֥וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> Why בָּ֖אתָה <S%H935><s%> Wherefore hast thou gone in אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> had a פִּילֶ֥גֶשׁ <S%H6370><s%> concubine אָבִֽי׃ <S%H1><s%> unto my father's

וַיִּחַר֩ <S%H2734><s%> wroth לְאַבְנֵ֨ר <S%H74><s%> Then was Abner מְאֹ֜ד <S%H3966><s%> very עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> for the words אִֽישׁ־ בֹּ֗שֶׁת <S%H378><s%> of Ishbosheth וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> and said הֲרֹ֨אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> head כֶּ֥לֶב <S%H3611><s%> [Am] I a dog's אָנֹ֘כִי֮ <S%H595><s%> I אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which לִֽיהוּדָה֒ <S%H3063><s%> which against Judah הַיּ֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day אֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> do shew חֶ֜סֶד <S%H2617><s%> kindness עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with בֵּ֣ית ׀ <S%H1004><s%> unto the house שָׁא֣וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul אָבִ֗יךָ <S%H1><s%> thy father אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his אֶחָיו֙ <S%H251><s%> to his brethren וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to מֵ֣רֵעֵ֔הוּ <S%H4828><s%> and to his friends וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not הִמְצִיתִ֖ךָ <S%H4672><s%> and have not delivered בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> thee into the hand דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> of David וַתִּפְקֹ֥ד <S%H6485><s%> that thou chargest עָלַ֛י <S%H5921><s%> over עֲוֹ֥ן <S%H5771><s%> with a fault הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> the woman הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> me to day

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> so יַעֲשֶׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> So do אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> God לְאַבְנֵ֔ר <S%H74><s%> to Abner וְכֹ֖ה <S%H3541><s%> also יֹסִ֣יף <S%H3254><s%> and more also ל֑וֹ כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> if כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after נִשְׁבַּ֤ע <S%H7650><s%> hath sworn יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> except as the LORD לְדָוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> to David כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> if כֵ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> this אֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> even so I do לּֽוֹ׃

לְהַֽעֲבִ֥יר <S%H5674><s%> To translate הַמַּמְלָכָ֖ה <S%H4467><s%> the kingdom מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> from the house שָׁא֑וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul וּלְהָקִ֞ים <S%H6965><s%> and to set up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כִּסֵּ֣א <S%H3678><s%> the throne דָוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> of David עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> over Israel וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and over יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> and over Judah מִדָּ֖ן <S%H1835><s%> from Dan וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against בְּאֵ֥ר שָֽׁבַע׃ <S%H884><s%> even to Beersheba

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יָכֹ֣ל <S%H3201><s%> And he could ע֔וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer לְהָשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> not answer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַבְנֵ֖ר <S%H74><s%> Abner דָּבָ֑ר <S%H1697><s%> a word מִיִּרְאָת֖וֹ <S%H3372><s%> again because he feared אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%> ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said ט֔וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Well אֲנִ֕י <S%H589><s%> I אֶכְרֹ֥ת <S%H3772><s%> I will make אִתְּךָ֖ <S%H854><s%> for בְּרִ֑ית <S%H1285><s%> a league אַ֣ךְ <S%H389><s%> also דָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> thing אֶחָ֡ד <S%H259><s%> with thee but one אָנֹכִי֩ <S%H595><s%> I שֹׁאֵ֨ל <S%H7592><s%> I require מֵאִתְּךָ֤ <S%H854><s%> for לֵאמֹר֙ <S%H559><s%> of thee that is לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִרְאֶ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> Thou shalt not see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פָּנַ֔י <S%H6440><s%> my face כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> except thou first הֱבִיאֲךָ֗ <S%H935><s%> bring אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> מִיכַ֣ל <S%H4324><s%> Michal בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> daughter שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul's בְּבֹאֲךָ֖ <S%H935><s%> when thou comest לִרְא֥וֹת <S%H7200><s%> to see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פָּנָֽי׃ <S%H6440><s%> my face ס
